mapper.select: SELECT bou.id, bou.account, bou.birthday, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,bou.birthday, CURDATE()) age, bou.create_date createDate, bou.is_init_password isInitPassword, bou.`name`, bou.phone, bou.phone_status phoneStatus, bou.photo, bou.remark, bou.sex, bou.`status`, bou.organization_person_type_id organizationPersonTypeId, bou.certificate_type certificateType, bou.certificate_type_name certificateTypeName, bou.certificate_number certificateNumber, bou.positive, bou.opposite, bou.password, bopt.`name` personTypeName, bdi.id doctorInfoId, bdi.certification, bdi.`name` doctorName, bdi.remark doctorRemark, bdi.school, bdodd.post, bdodd.department_id departmentId, bd.`name` departmentName, bdodd.authorize_aptitude authorizeAptitude, bdodd.work_number workNumber, bdodd.id doctorOrganizationDepartmentDutyId FROM base_organization_user bou LEFT JOIN base_organization_person_type bopt ON bou.organization_person_type_id=bopt.id LEFT JOIN base_doctor_info bdi ON bou.id = bdi.organization_user_id LEFT JOIN base_doctor_organization_department_duty bdodd ON bdodd.organization_user_id = bou.id AND bdodd.organization_id = #{organizationId} LEFT JOIN base_department bd ON bd.id = bdodd.department_id WHERE bou.id=#{id}

SELECT bouc.id, bouc.organization_user_id organizationUserId, bouc.certificate_type certificateType, bouc.certificate_type_name certificateTypeName, bouc.certificate_number certificateNumber, bouc.positive, bouc.opposite, bouc.images, bouc.create_date createDate FROM base_organization_user_certificate bouc WHERE bouc.organization_user_id = #{id}
